OOC: Striderzero, its fine with me.  In fact, it would have been pretty cool 
if Soundwave were alive to see Koj and wonder if he should fight this 
traitor, or befriend him in the name of peace!

:::The Skyscorchers:::

::The Skyscorchers, with heavy sparks, pick up there fallen comrade, and 
walked to Vulois' position::
Afterburner: How do we go about doing this?  Back in the old war, we barely 
had time to mourn, much less bury, our fallen comrades.
